response_parsed.title: Securing Microservices Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer will guide you through the process of securing your microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for authentication and authorization
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.76.0 or later is required for Python 3.12+
Ensure you have installed the `python-jose[cryptography]` package for JWT support
caveats: Remember to handle sensitive data securely, such as storing passwords securely and using HTTPS for communication
Always test your security measures thoroughly to ensure they are effective and do not introduce new vulnerabilities
